definition: to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
classifier for gifts, newspaper, magazine, papers, reports, contracts etc/variant of 分[fen4]

sentences.english: There was already more than enough femininity in his life.
sentences.chinese: 他的生命已經具備了夠充足的女性成份。

sentences.english: One of the most powerful cancer-promoting food ingredients of all is called sodium nitrate.
sentences.chinese: 最能致癌的食品成份之一就是硝酸鈉。

sentences.english: Free of alcohol, mild nature, safe and no irritation.
sentences.chinese: 本品不含酒精成份，性質溫和，安全無刺激。

sentences.english: The main content of cereal and potato is starch.
sentences.chinese: 穀物及薯類的主要成份是澱粉。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a chewing tablet taking acarbose as an active component.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及一種以阿卡波糖爲活性成份的咀嚼片。

sentences.english: It is suggested that the key ingredient is thermolysin.
sentences.chinese: 成功分離的關鍵成份是嗜熱菌蛋白酶。

sentences.english: Commercial Natamycin contains 50% of the active substance.
sentences.chinese: 商品納他黴素含有效成份50%。

sentences.english: A key component of MITE is the practicum.
sentences.chinese: MITE的一個關鍵成份是實習科目。

sentences.english: Sendi Pu'er Tea with its mellow tastingfragrant smell high-rich on human health ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 其滋味醇厚香氣獨特富含對人體極高的保健成份。

sentences.english: IR and conductivity dependance on temperature and composition have been measured.
sentences.chinese: 紅外和電導率隨溫度和成份的變化。

sentences.english: Collagen (type IV in basement membrane and types V and VI as fine fibrils ) comprises the structural component of ECM that provides shape and stability.
sentences.chinese: 膠原是細胞外基質的結構性成份，維持形狀和穩定性。

sentences.english: Fine calcium carbonate dentifrices ingredients effectively clean teeth, a healthier mouth.
sentences.chinese: 微細碳酸鈣潔齒成份，有效清潔牙齒，口腔更健康。

sentences.english: Woodmeal is of particular importance among combustible ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 在可燃成份中，木粉是特別重要的。

sentences.english: Overcooking, for example, destroys many nutrients.
sentences.chinese: 例如，過度烹飪會破壞許多營養成份。

sentences.english: You can also avoid unwholesome ingredients that show up in commercial baby food.
sentences.chinese: 您也可以防止有害成份，出現在商業嬰兒食品。

sentences.english: Results Adhesives were successfully detected in the samples.
sentences.chinese: 結果檢出包裝封口處的粘合劑成份。

definition: polysaccharide (complex carbohydrate such as starch 澱粉|淀粉 and cellulose 纖維素|纤维素)

pinyin: huang2 tong2 lei4 hua4 he2 wu4
